lead_paragraph: A Sports of The Times column on Sunday, about the recent sale of the filly Rachel Alexandra, referred incorrectly to an accomplished horse trainer who is related to Scott Blasi, the assistant trainer who works with the horse. The relative is Helen Pitts-Blasi, not Helene, and she is Mr. Blasi’s sister-in-law — not his wife. (She is married to Greg Blasi, who is also involved in the sport.).
